csgo is a great game. It's not as deep as a sims or a madden. It's more of a game of skill. Skill that takes a lot of practice.

But, that doesn't mean that everyone is good at CSGO or everyone should play CSGO.

A good number of CSGO players are better than average. In fact, many professional CSGO players are better than average. They have been spending hours on end practicing and learning CSGO. They are also better than average because they are the best of the best. There is really no point in saying that people should play CSGO because, like I said before
